title: Use Podman to Create and Work with Virtual Machines
author: Jack Wallen
description: Red Hat's Podman can not only be used to manage containers, but it is handy for building and maintaining virtual machines as well.
cntitle: 使用 Podman 创建和使用虚拟机
cndescription: Red Hat 的 Podman 不仅可以用来管理容器，而且对于构建和维护虚拟机也很方便。
